product_name: Louis Garneau CFS-300 Bike Shoes - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The women's Louis Garneau CFS-300 road bike shoes offer a new perspective on custom fit. They're heat-moldable, have adjustable padding, and come with 2 sets of insoles for differing weather. Synthetic leather/polyurethane uppers. Exo-Jet carbon outsole has multi-vent system. Reinforced heel-retention strap integrates with the mid-level strap to secure feet so you don't lose power. 100% heat-moldable system can be done at home, and shoes can be repeatedly molded. 2 sets of Coolmax Ergo Air insoles are provided to either allow ventilation on hot days or block air on colder days. Louis Garneau CFS-300 road bike shoes for women have carbon-molded arch support. Adjustable EVA foam padding is laterally and vertically adjustable with ratchet repositioning. Closeout.
short_description: The women's Louis Garneau CFS-300 road bike shoes offer a new perspective on custom fit. They're heat-moldable, have adjustable padding, and come with 2 sets of insoles for differing weather.
